about.paragraph: My name is Jay-donn Hendricks, and I am an aspiring developer currently studying to become a junior developer in the tech industry. My journey began at the age of 7 when I first explored a computer. I was fascinated by its inner workings and the components it was made of, igniting my passion for technology. This fascination led me to start building my own computers at the age of 10.My love for coding grew during the times when I had to update software. Delving deeper into understanding software functionality changed my perception of how profoundly it influences the entire computer, from programs to games. Now, I am dedicated to pursuing my dreams, aiming to become the best version of myself. I aspire to create new technologies and software that will revolutionize the world as we know it, benefiting both myself and others.

resume.description: I got my certificates on my 1st module: Facilitation
I got my certificates on my 2nd module: Team Work
I got my certificates on my 3rd module: Project Management
I got my certificate on First Aid

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Database
skills.experience: I've have been working on different types of databases since 2009, both SQL-structured and document-based. I enjoy working on a database; for me, that is where the magic happens. A well-structured database is the result of data integrity and many more.

skills.title: API
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.title: Programming
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming and database management are the skills that will stay with me forever, even though it is my first time to come across another programming language. It is crazy how I knew it syntax before starting coding. I have a decade of working experience on the following programming languages: C++, Python, Delphi, Javascript, VB.Net, C#, and Java. I still want to learn more about them.

testimonials.name: Muttaqeen
testimonials.quotes: I'm pleased to provide a testimonial for Jay-donn, an inspiring and hardworking aspiring web developer. He is not only dedicated to their craft but also a joy to work with. Their passion for web development is infectious, and they consistently go above and beyond to support their colleagues. He is an exceptional asset to any project or team, and I have no doubt that they will achieve great success in their web development journey.

testimonials.name: Almuakhir
testimonials.quotes: What impressed me most about Jay-doon was his ability to adapt and find innovative solutions to any challenges that arose during the project. They were always proactive in addressing issues and consistently met deadlines, ensuring that our website was launched on time.

testimonials.name: Thimna
testimonials.quotes: Jay-donn is one of the most humble and respectful person that I know. He is always willing to learn and help others which makes him a great team player and most importantly a leader. This is solely based on he's ability to conduct a crowd and ability to think on he's feet which makes him a great improviser. What I respect about him is that he is always willing to take accountability of whatever a situation presents itself. In conclusion he possesses one of the most important skills which is being able to gather information, carefully analyze it and present a solution that is critically thought out.
